key_risks: Regulatory risks due to dependence on government policies and subsidies
Market volatility from economic and geopolitical risks in emerging markets
Execution risks such as project delays, cost overruns, or technological failures
Climate and ESG risks including climate change, biodiversity loss, and human capital management
controversies: Potential greenwashing concerns regarding alignment with ESG objectives
Scrutiny over ESG impact metrics and specific portfolio holdings
environmental_issues: Climate change impacts on infrastructure projects
Biodiversity loss from large-scale infrastructure development
social_issues: Human capital management in project execution
Community impacts from infrastructure projects in emerging markets
governance_issues: Adherence to evolving global ESG reporting standards
